name: Mantle of Channeling
flavorText: Drawing power from the ether is a tricky thing. Even the most dedicated practitioner is not able to effectively contain all of it for their use. This armor redirects that excess energy to serve its wearer.
flavorTextHtml: Drawing power from the ether is a tricky thing. Even the most dedicated practitioner is not able to effectively contain all of it for their use. This armor redirects that excess energy to serve its wearer.

secondary.textHtml: While channeling Siphon Blood, Whirlwind, Rapid Fire, Strafe, Tempest Rush, Firebats, Arcane Torrent, Disintegrate, or Ray of Frost, you deal 24% increased damage and take 25% reduced damage. [20 - 25]%
secondary.text: While channeling Siphon Blood, Whirlwind, Rapid Fire, Strafe, Tempest Rush, Firebats, Arcane Torrent, Disintegrate, or Ray of Frost, you deal 24% increased damage and take 25% reduced damage. [20 - 25]%
